trans-unit.source: Provides the URL from which a code assembly originates as evidence for policy evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 提供程式碼組件的來源 URL 做為原則評估的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The presence of <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence produces a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission> in the grant set.
trans-unit.target: 與否<xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>辨識項，便會產生<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission>授權設定。

trans-unit.source: If there is a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission>, the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission> that corresponds to the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> evidence is compared to the demanded permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>如<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission>、<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission>對應於<xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>辨識項會與需要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file.
trans-unit.target: 會被視為完整的 URL，包括通訊協定 （HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP） 和檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
trans-unit.target: 例如，http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是完整的 URL。

trans-unit.source: URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position.
trans-unit.target: Url 可以完全相符或者最後一個位置中使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* is a wildcard URL.
trans-unit.target: 例如， http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* 是萬用字元的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of origin for the associated code assembly.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯程式碼組件的來源 URL。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> class with the URL from which a code assembly originates.
trans-unit.target: 使用程式碼組件的來源 URL 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前執行個體複本的新物件。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體複本的新物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new copy of the evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 建立辨識項物件的新複本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 辨識項物件的相同新複本。

trans-unit.source: The evidence set from which to construct the identity permission.
trans-unit.target: 要建構識別使用權限的來源辨識項集合 (Evidence Set)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an identity permission corresponding to the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> evidence class.
trans-unit.target: 建立對應於 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 辨識項類別目前執行個體的識別 (Identity) 使用權限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> evidence.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission" />，用於指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> evidence object to test for equivalence with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要測試與目前物件是否相等的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 辨識項物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> evidence object to the specified object for equivalence.
trans-unit.target: 比較目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 辨識項物件與指定物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 物件相等則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code of the current URL.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 URL 的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code of the current URL.
trans-unit.target: 目前 URL 的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Url" /> 的表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL from which the code assembly originates.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URL，其為程式碼組件的來源。

trans-unit.source: The URL from which the code assembly originates.
trans-unit.target: URL，程式碼組件的來源。
